instruction: Compose a rap verse about the power of friendship.
output:
Verse 1:
Friends they come they go,
but true friendship will always show,
A bond deeper than the depths of the sea,
Will always have its place with you and me.

Verse 2:
Loyalty, trust and kindness prevail,
Facing any obstacle, I won't fail,
A shoulder to cry on, and a safe haven,
A friend is someone you can depend on.

Verse 3:
Raise each other up no matter what,
Wherever you go, it's a friendship Butt,
So don't forget in your darkest hour,
That friendship is a powerful tower.
